p: To identify the causative agents of these outbreaks, detection of five viruses closely associated with AGE was performed according to the Viral Diarrhea Surveillance Scheme in Shandong Province. NoV, RoV, SaV and Ast were detected by real-time RT-PCR; ADV was detected by real-time PCR (Bioperfectus Technologies Co., Jiangsu, China) on a Stratagene Mx3005P system (USA) [ 20]. The amplification conditions were according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. The virus-negative samples were sent to the Department of Microbiology at the Jinan CDC for bacterial testing.
